Title: Azure Sudoku
Description:
Azure Sudoku is an Azure-hosted Silverlight implementation of the popular game Sudoku. Various Hawaiian backgrounds appear with each new game.

This project is useful as a working example of how to combine Azure, Silverlight, and WCF in a single solution.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Azure Sudoku is an Azure-hosted Silverlight implementation of the popular game Sudoku. Various Hawaiian backgrounds appear with each new game.

This project is useful as a working example of how to combine Azure, Silverlight, and WCF in a single solution.






Azure Sudoku makes use of a C# port of public domain code for Sudoku puzzle generation known as the Dancing Links Engine.

A community donation from Neudesic, a Microsoft Gold Partner and National Systems Integrator
http://www.neudesic.com

For support contact David Pallmann
http://davidpallmann.blogspot.com
